description: If unit's Atk - foe's Atk >= 1, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

name: Threaten Spd 1
description: Inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces at the start of each turn

name: Threaten Spd 2
description: Inflicts Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces at the start of each turn

name: Threaten Spd 3
description: Inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces at the start of each turn

name: Blizzard
description: Grants Res+3. Grants bonus to unit's Atk equal to total penalties on foe during combat.

name: Chilling Seal
description: At the start of each turn, if unit's HP >= 50%, inflicts Atk/Spd-6 on foe on the enemy team with the lowest Def through its next action. (Skill cannot be inherited.)

name: Hagoita
description: Grants Def/Res+2 during combat to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Hagoita+
description: Grants Def/Res+2 during combat to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Kadomatsu
description: Grants Def/Res+2 during combat to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Kadomatsu+
description: Grants Def/Res+2 during combat to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Hama Ya
description: Effective against flying foes. Grants Def/Res+2 during combat to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Hama Ya+
description: Effective against flying foes. Grants Def/Res+2 during combat to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Kagami Mochi
description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-5 on target and foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

name: Kagami Mochi+
description: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces through their next actions.

name: Earth Dance 1
description: If Sing or Dance is used, target also granted Def+2.

name: Earth Dance 2
description: If Sing or Dance is used, target also granted Def+3.

name: Earth Dance 3
description: If Sing or Dance is used, target also granted Def+4.

name: Spd Def Bond 1
description: Grants Spd/Def+3 to this unit during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally.

name: Spd Def Bond 2
description: Grants Spd/Def+3 to this unit during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally.

name: Spd Def Bond 3
description: Grants Spd/Def+3 to this unit during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally.

name: Thani
description: Grants Res+3. Effective against armored and cavalry foes. Against armored and cavalry foes using bow, dagger, magic, or staff, damage from first attack received by unit during combat reduced by 30%.

name: Sacrifice
description: Converts penalties on target into bonuses. Restores target's HP = unit's current HP - 1. Unit's HP reduced by amount restored.

name: Peshkatz
description: After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions, and grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit and allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn.

name: Spur Atk Spd 1
description: Grants adjacent allies Atk/Spd +2 during combat.

name: Spur Atk Spd 2
description: Grants adjacent allies Atk/Spd +3 during combat.

name: Warp Powder
description: If unit's HP >= 80%, unit can move adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces.
